ai-patthana15.65:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.65:0.3_0: doing what is good and wholesome,
ai-patthana15.65:1.1_0: Not in the sphere of the skillful, unskillful quality, or in the formless.
ai-patthana15.65:1.1_1: Not socializing, skilled in the fine-material sphere, or skilled in the formless realm.
ai-patthana15.65:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.65:2.1_0: Not with the profitable way, or with the fine-material sphere doesn’t give rise to the unskillful, or with the fine- material sphere.
ai-patthana15.65:2.1_3: What are the two kinds of temperament?
